messages.title: Getting on with the country's priorities
messages.content: More hospitals. More doctors and nurses. More investment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: It means we can invest in new technology, help senior staff take on more shifts so we cut waiting times for patients, and protect the NHS for generations to come.
It means we can cut hospital waiting times, help more people access the healthcare they need, and deliver hospitals that are modern and fit for purpose.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Hiring more doctors and more nurses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We’ve created more training places, hired 17,100 more doctors and 16,900 more nurses since 2010, and we’re giving the NHS more money to hire doctors and nurses.

issues.economy: Together we’ve put our economy back on track.
issues.health: The NHS is part of our heritage. It’s a statement of who we are as a country. That's why we're investing billions extra. Hiring more doctors and nurses. And building 40 new hospitals. We are able to do this because of the hard work of the British people. We've taken the tough decisions and together we've put our economy back on track. So we're able to protect the NHS for generations to come.

images.caption: WHAT WE’RE DOING FOR THE NHS Investing £33.9 billion extra – EVERY year Building 40 new hospitals Hiring more doctors and more nurses

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative and Unionist Party, both at 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ. Printed by P&P Group PLC, Europa Park, Lichfield Road, Kettlebrook, Tamworth, B77 5DY.
